title: Machine Learning Engineer
description:
🚀 PepsiCo is Hiring: Machine Learning Engineer in Hyderabad! 🚀

Are you ready to revolutionize the future of Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence? PepsiCo is looking for a talented Machine Learning Engineer to join our dynamic team in Hyderabad!




About the Role:

As a Machine Learning Engineer, you will play a pivotal role in developing and deploying cutting-edge ML and AI solutions. You’ll work with advanced analytics toolsets in a CI/CD environment, leveraging technologies like Spark, Databricks, and Microsoft Azure. Your work will directly impact our ability to deliver scalable, automated, and innovative ML models that drive business value.




Key Responsibilities:

✅ Deliver Advanced Analytics/Data Science projects within time and budget, focusing on DevOps/MLOps and ML models.

✅ Collaborate with data engineers and ML engineers to build and optimize data pipelines (batch to real-time).

✅ Automate the end-to-end ML lifecycle using Azure Machine Learning and Azure Pipelines.

✅ Set up cloud alerts, monitors, dashboards, and logging for ML infrastructure.

✅ Deploy and automate ML models in production environments.




Work Timing: 11:30 AM - 9:00 PM




Qualifications:

✅ 8+ years of total IT experience, including 4+ years in Data Science/Machine Learning.

✅ 4+ years of hands-on SQL experience.

✅ Strong experience in DevOps and Machine Learning, with expertise in cloud platforms like Azure (preferred).

✅ Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Math, Physics, or a related technical field.




Why PepsiCo?

At PepsiCo, you’ll be part of a collaborative, interdisciplinary team that values innovation and creativity. You’ll work on high-impact projects, interact with process owners and business users, and see the real-world impact of your work.




📩 Interested? Share your resume with me at sana.iqwal.contractor@pepsico.com and let’s shape the future of ML and AI together!
